description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the Windows Layer-2 Bridge Network Driver Denial of Service vulnerability (CVE-2024-38102), apply the relevant updates as detailed below:

1. Identify the Windows version your system is running.
2. Download the appropriate KB update:
   - For Windows 11 Version 23H2 (x64): Apply [KB5040442](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040442) 
   - For Windows 10 Version 22H2 (x64): Apply [KB5040427](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040427)
   - For Windows 10 Version 21H2 (x64): Apply [KB5040431](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040431)
   - For Windows 10 (x86): Apply [KB5040448](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5040448)
3. Execute the installation and restart your system to apply the changes.

**Details**:
- The updates address the out-of-bounds read vulnerability, which could lead to a denial of service.
- Ensure you are running one of the specified Windows builds before proceeding with the updates.
- Backup important data before applying updates.

Additional information can be found in the official documentation on the [MSRC site](https://msrc.microsoft.com/update-guide/vulnerability/CVE-2024-38102).
